name: Granny Unleashed
description:
Granny Unleashed is a collaborative 48hrs Game Jam game made by:
Programming: Axel Thomsen and  Jan Plähn
Art: Natali Arvidsson, Ana Laura Martinez and Axel Sandstedt
Level and Sound design: Gustav Rander

The player has to help their grandmother escape the retirement home while she rambles and gossips.
She is a very fragile human being, so don't drop her.

We challenge you to win this game :)

Controls

■ Up arrow key = Froward
■ Down arrow key = Backward
■ Left arrow key and right arrow key = balancing granny
■ Space bar = Boost

Background music by Kevin McLeod.
